description: This file defines an interface IRemoteConnection within the WPEFramework RPC namespace, including nested notification interface and methods related to remote connection management.

classes.name: IRemoteConnection
classes.description: An interface representing a remote connection with methods for identification, control, and notifications.

classes.name: IRemoteConnection::INotification
classes.description: A nested interface for receiving notifications about connection status changes.

classes.name: IStringIterator
classes.description: Iterator type over strings in the framework.

classes.name: IValueIterator
classes.description: Iterator type over uint32_t values in the framework.

methods.name: IRemoteConnection::IRemoteConnection
methods.description: Virtual destructor for the remote connection interface.

methods.name: IRemoteConnection::INotification::~INotification
methods.description: Virtual destructor for the notification interface.

methods.name: IRemoteConnection::INotification::Activated
methods.description: Callback invoked when a remote connection is activated.

methods.name: IRemoteConnection::INotification::Deactivated
methods.description: Callback invoked when a remote connection is deactivated.

methods.name: IRemoteConnection::INotification::Terminated
methods.description: Callback invoked when a remote connection is terminated.

methods.name: IRemoteConnection::Id
methods.description: Returns the ID of the connection.

methods.name: IRemoteConnection::RemoteId
methods.description: Returns the remote ID associated with the connection.

methods.name: IRemoteConnection::Acquire
methods.description: Acquires an interface with given interface ID and version, with wait time.

methods.name: IRemoteConnection::Acquire (template version)
methods.description: Template method to acquire a specific interface type.

methods.name: REQUESTEDINTERFACE * Acquire(const uint32_t waitTime,const string & className,const uint32_t version)

ctags.name: Acquire
ctags.pattern: /^            REQUESTEDINTERFACE* Acquire(const uint32_t waitTime, const string& className, const /
ctags.signature: (const uint32_t waitTime,const string & className,const uint32_t version)

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^            struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: IRemoteConnection
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL IRemoteConnection : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
